text: David G. Sills (March 21, 1938 â€“ August 23, 2011) was an American jurist. Sills served as the presiding justice for the California Court of Appeal for the Fourth Appellate District, Division Three. He is a former mayor of Irvine, California.Mitchell, Greg, David Sills, November 1998, accessed December 8, 2013 He was married to the daughter of former President Ronald Reagan. Sills died in Irvine, California, aged 73. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Reagan family Category:American mayors Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Peoria, Illinois
title: David Sills
